snippet: The Times Talk discussion on Wednesday evening featured Ken and Sarah Burns, who made the documentary “The Central Park Five”; the reporter Jim Dwyer; and the five men who were wrongly accused of rape in the 1989 case.
abstract: The Times Talk discussion on Wednesday evening featured Ken and Sarah Burns, who made the documentary “The Central Park Five”; the reporter Jim Dwyer; and the five men who were wrongly accused of rape in the 1989 case.

headline.main: Times Talks: Ken Burns on Justice and 'The Central Park Five'
